name: Signail
description:
Signail is a puzzle game with some fast-paced elements where the way to win is to collaborate with an AI, no matter if friends, enemies (guardians of the lab) or inanimate objects.


 
A robot is stuck in an abandoned lab, closed in a room and you need to use, your speed, your mind and your powers to escape in 5 levels with different gimmicks and ways to use your surroundings.


You can move with your arrows and using Z to inalterate AIs. Some enemies will go slower, some will change direction, some obstacles can't work properly and so on. If you press Z again, everything will return to normal. Use this skill well because it's not possible to escape without it.

The game is made in 3 days and 10 hours for the Wowie Jam 4, by Jonas Tyroller.
The theme was: "Collaborate with an AI" and...I can't wait to see if you liked it!
